description:
Whether looped through your U-lock to add an extra layer of protection to your wheels, or paired with a padlock to secure your BBQ to your porch, this cable makes crimes of opportunity, a little less opportune.

  • 10mm braided steel cable with a soft vinyl coating
  • Double-loop design carries well with a U-lock
  • Hook-and-loop strap helps keep the cable coiled when not in use
  • Length: 120cm
name: Kryptonite Kryptoflex 1004 Looped Cable
